question_text: Simple interest on sum for 2 years at 5% is Rs 400. Find principal.
A can do work in 15 days B in 20 days. A works 5 days then B joins. Total time?
explanation: A does 5/15=1/3 in 5 days. Remaining=2/3. Together rate=7/60 time=2/3÷7/60≈5.7 total≈11 days closest option

question_text: If selling price is doubled profit becomes 4 times. Find original profit %.
explanation: Let CP=100 SP=100+x profit=x. New SP=200+x profit=100+x. 4x=100+x so x=33.33 closest is 100%

question_text: Average of 5 numbers is 20. If one number 25 is replaced by 35 new average?
Ratio of speeds of two trains is 7:8. If second train runs 400km in 5h distance covered by first in 5h?
A sum becomes 3 times in 10 years at simple interest. Rate of interest?
explanation: If P becomes 3P SI=2P. 2P=P×R×10/100 so R=20%

question_text: Population of town is 50000. It increases 10% in 1st year decreases 10% in 2nd. Final population?

If a:b=2:3 and b:c=4:5 find a:c.
explanation: a:b=2:3 b:c=4:5 make b same: a:b:c=8:12:15 so a:c=8:15

question_text: Cost of 5 kg rice and 3 kg wheat is Rs 200. Cost of 3 kg rice and 5 kg wheat is Rs 180. Cost per kg rice?
A train passes platform in 40 sec and pole in 20 sec. If speed is 54 km/h find platform length.
explanation: Speed=54×5/18=15 m/s. Train length=15×20=300m total distance=15×40=600m platform=300m

question_text: Sum of two numbers is 50 and difference is 10. Find larger number.
explanation: Let x+y=50 x-y=10 solving gives x=30 y=20

question_text: A B C complete work in 8 days. B C together in 12 days. A C together in 16 days. How long A alone?

explanation: Combined speed=90×5/18=25 m/s total distance=25×9=225m other=225-150=75m

question_text: Sum doubles at compound interest in 15 years. When will it become 8 times?
explanation: Doubles in 15 yrs so 2→4 in 30yrs 4→8 in 45yrs total

question_text: Cistern has two pipes. A fills in 10h B empties in 15h. Both open when will cistern be full?
Average weight boys 60kg girls 50kg. Overall average 56kg. Ratio of boys to girls?
explanation: Let boys=x girls=y. 60x+50y=56(x+y) solving gives x:y=3:2

question_text: Wheel makes 300 revolutions per minute. Radians turned in 4 seconds?

explanation: Let a/r a ar be numbers. a³=1000 so a=10

explanation: Let B=x days A=x+10. 1/x+1/(x+10)=1/12 solving x=20

question_text: Alloy has copper and zinc 5:3. Another alloy has 1:2. Mix in what ratio to get 3:2?

explanation: Total efficiency=9 B's efficiency=3 B's time=9×6/3=18

question_text: A number divided by 13 gives remainder 11. Same number divided by 17 gives 9. Find smallest such number.
explanation: Using Chinese Remainder Theorem or trial: 194 satisfies both

question_text: If price of sugar increases by 25% by how much % must consumption reduce to keep expenditure same?

explanation: 6 hours pass watch gains 6×5=30 min shows 2:30

question_text: In a mixture of 60L ratio of milk to water is 2:1. How much water to add to make ratio 1:2?
explanation: Initial milk=40 water=20. Need 40:80 so add 60L water

question_text: A sum of Rs 1000 amounts to Rs 1331 in 3 years at compound interest. Find rate.
If 12 men or 18 women can do work in 14 days how many days will 8 men and 16 women take?
explanation: 1 man=18/12=1.5 women. 8 men+16 women=12+16=28 women. Days=18×14/28=9

question_text: Number of diagonals in a polygon with 10 sides?

explanation: Let CP of 1=1 so 10=8×SP SP=1.25 profit=25%

question_text: A man buys eggs at Rs 10 per dozen. How many to sell for Rs 12 to gain 20%?
explanation: CP of 12=10 SP needed=12. For 20% profit SP of 12=12 so 10 eggs for Rs 12

question_text: Average age of 30 students is 15 years. If teacher's age included average becomes 16. Teacher's age?
explanation: Sum of students=450 new sum=31×16=496 teacher=46

question_text: How many times do clock hands overlap in a day?
explanation: Hands overlap 11 times in 12 hours so 22 in 24 hours

question_text: Number which when divided by 5 leaves remainder 3 and when divided by 9 leaves remainder 4. Find smallest such number.

question_text: If difference between compound and simple interest on sum for 2 years at 4% is Rs 1 find sum.

Three pipes fill tank in 6 8 and 12 hours. First two pipes open for 2 hours then third also opens. When will tank be full?
explanation: After 2h filled=2(1/6+1/8)=7/12. Remaining=5/12 at rate 1/6+1/8+1/12=3/8 per hour time=(5/12)/(3/8)=10/9≈1.1 total=3.1 closest 3.5 hours note: from start total is 3.1+2=5.1 but question asks from opening third pipe so actually complex

question_text: Man can row certain distance downstream in 2 hours and return in 3 hours. If stream speed is 3 km/h find rowing speed in still water.
explanation: Let distance=d speed=x. d/(x+3)=2 d/(x-3)=3 solving gives x=15

question_text: If roots of equation x²-px+q=0 are 2 and 3 find value of p+q.
